instructions.name: accept_admin_transfer
docs: Accept admin transfer (must be called by the proposed admin)

accounts.name: new_admin
docs: The proposed admin who is accepting the transfer

instructions.name: cancel_admin_transfer
docs: Cancel a pending admin transfer (called by current admin)

accounts.name: creator_vault
docs: Seeds: ["creator-vault", creator_pubkey] where creator=dat_authority.
The CPI to collect_creator_fee will fail if this is not a valid vault.
NOTE: Vault is a native SOL account (System Program owner), NOT owned by PUMP_PROGRAM.

accounts.name: root_treasury
docs: via PDA derivation: ["root_treasury", root_token_mint]

instructions.name: collect_fees_amm
docs: Collect fees from PumpSwap AMM creator vault
Used for tokens that have migrated from bonding curve to AMM
Requires: DAT authority PDA must be set as coin_creator in PumpSwap
IMPORTANT: This collects WSOL (SPL Token), not native SOL

accounts.name: dat_wsol_account
docs: DAT's WSOL token account (destination for collected fees)

instructions.name: create_pumpfun_token_mayhem
docs: Create a PumpFun token in Mayhem Mode with AI trading agent
Uses Token2022 and create_v2 instruction
Supply: 2 billion tokens (1B + 1B for agent)

instructions.name: deposit_fee_asdf
docs: External app deposits $ASDF fees with automatic split
Split: 99.448% → DAT ATA (burn), 0.552% → Rebate Pool ATA (rebates)
Architecture:
- Payer transfers full amount
- 99.448% goes to DAT ATA (included in ROOT cycle single burn)
- 0.552% goes to Rebate Pool ATA (self-sustaining fund)
- UserStats.pending_contribution tracks full amount for rebate calculation

accounts.name: rebate_pool
docs: Rebate pool state (for tracking deposits)

accounts.name: user_stats
docs: User stats - initialized if needed
Protocol pays rent via dat_authority

accounts.name: user
docs: The user whose contribution is being tracked

accounts.name: payer_token_account
docs: Payer's $ASDF token account (source of deposit)

accounts.name: dat_asdf_account
docs: DAT's $ASDF token account (receives 99.448% for burn)

accounts.name: rebate_pool_ata
docs: Rebate pool's $ASDF ATA (receives 0.552% for rebates)

accounts.name: payer
docs: Transaction payer (can be builder or protocol)

instructions.name: execute_buy
docs: Execute buy on bonding curve - ROOT TOKEN ONLY (simpler, no split logic)
For secondary tokens, use execute_buy_secondary instead

accounts.name: dat_asdf_account
docs: DAT's token account for receiving bought tokens - validated mint and authority

instructions.name: execute_buy_amm
docs: Execute buy on PumpSwap AMM pool (for migrated tokens)
This instruction handles tokens that have graduated from bonding curve to AMM
Requires WSOL in dat_wsol_account for the buy operation
MEDIUM-01 FIX: Added slippage validation to ensure received tokens meet minimum threshold

accounts.name: dat_token_account
docs: DAT's token account for receiving bought tokens - validated mint and authority

accounts.name: base_mint
docs: Base token mint (the token being bought)

accounts.name: base_token_program
docs: Base token program (SPL Token or Token2022)

instructions.name: execute_buy_secondary
docs: Execute buy for SECONDARY tokens (includes fee split to root treasury)

accounts.name: dat_asdf_account
docs: DAT's token account - validated mint and authority

accounts.name: pool_asdf_account
docs: Pool's token account - validated mint matches

instructions.name: execute_fee_split
docs: Execute a pending fee split change (after cooldown period)

accounts.name: admin
docs: Admin signer required - only admin can finalize allocated cycles

instructions.name: initialize_rebate_pool
docs: Initialize the self-sustaining rebate pool
Called once during protocol setup

accounts.name: admin
docs: Admin must authorize initialization

instructions.name: initialize_validator
docs: Initialize validator state for trustless per-token fee tracking
Must be called once per token before register_validated_fees can be used

instructions.name: process_user_rebate
docs: Process user rebate - transfer from pool to selected user
Called as LAST instruction in ROOT cycle batch
NOTE: This instruction does NOT burn. The burn happens in the single
ROOT cycle burn instruction which includes all DAT ATA balance
(buyback + user deposits 99.448%).
This instruction only:
1. Validates user eligibility (pending >= threshold)
2. Calculates rebate amount (0.552% of pending)
3. Transfers rebate from pool → user ATA
4. Resets pending and updates stats

accounts.name: rebate_pool
docs: Rebate pool authority PDA

accounts.name: rebate_pool_ata
docs: Rebate pool's $ASDF ATA (source of rebate funds)

accounts.name: user_stats
docs: Selected user's stats

accounts.name: user_ata
docs: User's $ASDF ATA (destination for rebate)

accounts.name: admin
docs: Admin authorization for rebate processing

instructions.name: propose_admin_transfer
docs: Propose a new admin (two-step transfer for security)

instructions.name: propose_fee_split
docs: Propose a fee split change (subject to timelock)

accounts.name: admin
docs: Admin signer required to prevent DoS attacks

instructions.name: register_validated_fees
docs: ADMIN ONLY - Register validated fees extracted from PumpFun transaction logs
Only admin can call this to commit validated fee data
Security: Protected by admin check, slot progression, and fee caps

accounts.name: admin
docs: Admin signer - only admin can register fees (CRITICAL security fix)

instructions.name: reset_validator_slot
docs: ADMIN ONLY - Reset validator slot to current slot
Used when validator has been inactive for too long (slot delta > 1000)
This allows the validator daemon to resume operation without redeploying

instructions.name: sync_validator_slot
docs: Sync validator slot to current slot (permissionless)
This instruction allows anyone to reset the last_validated_slot to the current slot
when the validator state has become stale (> MAX_SLOT_RANGE behind current slot).
This is useful after periods of inactivity to allow the daemon to resume operation.
Note: This does NOT affect fee attribution - it simply allows new validations to proceed.
Any fees from the skipped slots are lost (this is acceptable for inactivity periods).

accounts.name: admin
docs: Admin authority - HIGH-02 FIX: Required to prevent DoS

instructions.name: transfer_admin
docs: DEPRECATED: Use propose_admin_transfer + accept_admin_transfer instead
Kept for backwards compatibility - now just proposes the transfer

instructions.name: transfer_dev_fee
docs: Transfer 1% dev sustainability fee
Called at the end of each batch transaction, after burn succeeds
1% today = 99% burns forever

accounts.name: dev_wallet
docs: 1% today = 99% burns forever

instructions.name: unwrap_wsol
docs: Unwrap WSOL to native SOL in DAT authority account
Call this after collect_fees_amm to convert WSOL to SOL for buyback

accounts.name: dat_wsol_account
docs: DAT's WSOL token account (will be closed)

instructions.name: wrap_wsol
docs: Wrap native SOL to WSOL for AMM buyback
Call this before execute_buy_amm when root token is on PumpSwap AMM
The dat_wsol_account must already exist (created by caller)

accounts.name: dat_wsol_account
docs: DAT's WSOL token account (destination for wrapped SOL)
Must be owned by dat_authority and have WSOL mint

errors.name: VaultNotInitialized
errors.msg: Vault not initialized - execute a trade first

errors.name: BelowRebateThreshold
errors.msg: User pending contribution below rebate threshold

docs: Emitted when admin transfer is completed

types.name: CycleFailed

types.name: DATInitialized

types.name: DATState
docs: Global DAT configuration and statistics
Stores system-wide settings, admin controls, and cumulative metrics.
Only one DATState account exists per program instance.

fields.name: pending_burn_amount

fields.name: root_token_mint

fields.name: pending_admin

fields.name: admin_operation_cooldown

docs: Last time update_fee_split was called (direct path)
Separate from pending_fee_split_timestamp to prevent bypass attacks

types.name: EmergencyAction
docs: Emitted for emergency actions (pause/resume)

types.name: FeeAsdfDeposited
docs: Emitted when $ASDF fee is deposited via external app

types.name: FeeSplitUpdated
docs: Emitted when fee split ratio is updated

types.name: FeesRedirectedToRoot
docs: Emitted when fees are redirected from secondary to root token

types.name: PendingFeesUpdated
docs: Emitted when pending fees are updated by daemon

types.name: RebatePool
docs: Rebate Pool authority PDA for external app integration
Self-sustaining model: automatically funded by 0.552% of each $ASDF deposit.
The rebate pool ATA holds $ASDF tokens for distributing rebates to users.
Architecture:
- PDA: ["rebate_pool"] - Authority that can sign for ATA transfers
- ATA: getATA(rebate_pool_pda, ASDF_MINT) - Holds rebate funds
Funding flow:
- deposit_fee_asdf() splits: 99.448% → DAT ATA, 0.552% → Rebate Pool ATA
- process_user_rebate() transfers from pool → user ATA
PDA Seeds: ["rebate_pool"]

docs: PDA bump seed

fields.name: total_distributed

types.name: TokenStats
docs: Per-token statistics tracking
Each token in the ecosystem has its own TokenStats account
to track individual metrics like burns, fees, and cycles.

fields.name: last_cycle_timestamp

docs: SOL collected in last cycle

fields.name: last_cycle_burned
docs: Tokens burned in last cycle

fields.name: is_root_token

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

docs: Emitted when per-token statistics are initialized

types.name: UserRebateProcessed

types.name: UserStats
docs: User contribution statistics for external app integration
Tracks individual user contributions from external apps paying in $ASDF.
Users accumulate pending_contribution until selected in rebate lottery.
PDA Seeds: ["user_stats_v1", user_pubkey]

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed

fields.name: user
docs: The user's wallet address

fields.name: pending_contribution
docs: $ASDF pending contribution (awaiting rebate processing)
Reset to 0 when user is selected for rebate

fields.name: total_contributed
docs: Lifetime total $ASDF contributed

fields.name: total_rebate
docs: Lifetime total $ASDF rebate received

fields.name: last_update_timestamp
docs: Proof-of-history: timestamp of last modification
Updated on every deposit or rebate processing

fields.name: last_update_slot
docs: Proof-of-history: slot of last modification
Additional verification for chronological order

types.name: UserStatsInitialized
docs: Emitted when user stats are initialized

types.name: ValidatedFeesRegistered

types.name: ValidatorInitialized
docs: Emitted when a validator is initialized for trustless fee tracking

types.name: ValidatorState
docs: Validator state for trustless per-token fee attribution
Tracks fees validated from PumpFun transaction logs.
Used for cryptographic proof that fees were actually generated
by specific token trades.

fields.name: bump
docs: PDA bump seed
